text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do you & @GOP have courage to stand up to @realDonaldTrump who is killing Americans w/o leadership for #COVID19; lying, doing nothing when Russia put a bounty on our troops & so many more despicable deeds.  Complicit w/#Trump to destroy our country #GOPCorruptionOverCountry
